identity.name: TGP Bioplastics
identity.mission: Sustainable manufacturing efficiency through clarity and precision.
identity.archetype: Organic & Earthy (Trust, Growth, Calm) with a Technical Twist

headings.usage: All section headers, modal titles, and dashboard widget titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: General text, card descriptions, inputs. Optimized for legibility at small sizes.

mono.usage: ID numbers, timestamps, technical data points.

primary.name: Bio-Moss
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key brand elements. Represents sustainability and growth.

secondary.name: Industrial Slate
secondary.usage: Secondary buttons, inactive icons, borders. Represents the manufacturing machinery.

accent.name: Pellet Amber
accent.usage: Warnings, 'In Progress' status, call-to-action highlights. Represents the raw bioplastic material.

visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.08) for light mode, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) for dark mode. Use 'rounded-lg' for cards.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for hover states. Avoid heavy drop shadows; prefer subtle depth.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80' for sticky headers and modal overlays to maintain context.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the sidebar background to give a 'recycled paper' feel.

layout_strategy.dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode B: Control Room). Dense, data-heavy, minimal gaps (gap-4).
layout_strategy.landing_page: Tetris Grid (Mode A). Asymmetrical, generous spacing (gap-12), large hero visuals.
layout_strategy.kanban_board: Horizontal scrolling swimlanes. Columns must have fixed width (min-w-[300px]) but flexible height.

components.buttons: Pill-shaped for marketing, slightly rounded rectangles (rounded-md) for dashboard actions.
components.cards: Flat white background with 1px border. On hover: slight lift (-translate-y-1) and border color shift to Primary.
components.modals: Clean, white background, no heavy headers. Use large typography for titles.

motion.drag: Scale up (1.02) and shadow-lg when dragging a card.
motion.page_load: Staggered fade-in for dashboard widgets (0.1s delay per item).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is always WCAG AA compliant. Use dark slate (#1E293B) for text on light backgrounds, never pure black.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible 2px ring in Primary color offset by 2px.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Respect user preference for reduced motion.

hero_background.description: Clean, modern factory aisle with bright lighting. Use as hero background with overlay.

team_collaboration.description: Diverse team discussing on tablets. Use for 'About Us' or 'Team' section.

texture_accent.description: Abstract bioplastic pellets. Use as a texture background for cards or banners.

lab_context.description: Lab setting with equipment. Use for 'Quality Control' feature highlight.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Manrope' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Use the defined 'Bio-Moss' (#2E5C38) as the primary brand color. Do NOT use the forbidden Teal.
Create a 'KanbanCard' component that is distinct from the standard Shadcn Card. It should be more compact and have a colored status indicator.
Ensure the Kanban board supports horizontal scrolling for many columns.
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the main dashboard overview (stats + recent activity).
Apply the 'Subtle noise' texture to the sidebar to reinforce the 'Bioplastic/Recycled' brand identity.
For the Landing Page, use the 'Tetris Grid' layout to showcase features asymmetrically.
All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
